title: The Eternal Spark Of Our Love
alternative_title: Towa ni Kagayaku Koi no Senkou o ; Towani Kagayaku Koino Senkoo ; とわに輝く恋の閃光を
status: Towa ni Kagayaku Koi no Senkou o ; Towani Kagayaku Koino Senkoo ; とわに輝く恋の閃光を
description:
Description :
        Mao Sugaya and Eishi Kaida have married through Japan's LGBT partnership system, and moved to the US together for Mao's film shoot and Eishi's rehabilitation. Their new life is wonderful, and while Eishi's fingertips aren't quite ready to play guitar again, he's asked to perform at a club when hanging with some friends. When a video of the show starts trending on social media under Eishi's name, his friends' band blows up! Everyone's future looks bright. Now that Eishi has his confidence back and Mao's done shooting his film, the pair return to Japan. This is the sequel to Mao and Eishi's love story!
